required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion for the Induction of General Anesthesia in Elective Surgery Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Propofol-Controlled Phase III Clinical Trial Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion for the Induction of General Anesthesia in Elective Surgery Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multi-center, randomized, double-blind, propofol-controlled phase III clinical trial. The primary objective is to compare the efficacy and safety between propofol and HSK3486 for the induction of general anesthesia in elective surgery subjects, so as to provide reference for marketing registration of HSK3486.

primary_outcome.measure: The success rate of induction of anesthesia
primary_outcome.time_frame: During induction of general anesthesia on day 1

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the initial administration of the investigational drug to the first time when MOAA/S is ≤1 on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to loss of eyelash reflex
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the initial administration of the investigational drug to loss of eyelash reflex on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of the investigational drug and alternative drugs
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During induction of general anesthesia on day 1
During induction of general anesthesia on day 1
During induction of general anesthesia on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events

intervention.description: Initial dose of 0.4 mg/kg followed by 0.2 mg/kg if needed.
Initial dose of 2.0 mg/kg followed by 1.0 mg/kg if needed

facility.name: West China Hospital of Sichuan University
